mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE B_ISBN = #{isbn} AND B_S_ID = #{sellerId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK WHERE UPPER(B_TITLE) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{keyword} || '%')

SELECT CATEGORY_S, B_TITLE, B_AUTHOR, B_SALESTOCK, B_RENTALSTOCK FROM BOOK INNER JOIN CATEGORY_S ON BOOK.B_CATEGORY_S_ID = CATEGORY_S.CATEGORY_S_ID WHERE B_S_ID = 'seller001'
AND UPPER(CATEGORY_S.CATEGORY_S) = UPPER(#{keyword})
AND UPPER(B_TITLE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%'
AND UPPER(B_AUTHOR) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{keyword}) || '%'
